root: ^"Sorry you scared me, I haven't seen a soul in ages! My name's Flora. What's yours?"
^"Nice to meet you Abida! I know, I know, my name's quite ironic my parents were simply unimaginative fools."
^"A young flame like yourself? Lost here? I'm sorry I have not seen anyone. I don't know how I have survived this long myself."
^"I hope you find your brother. I'm a lost cause, leave me here. It won't be much longer until I pass."
^"Before you go, take this! It's not much use to me, but it'll help you on your search for your brother."
